#summary A primer for potential users of this library.
#labels Featured

=== Introduction ===

Knowing of the custom importing framework that this library provides, a user will have at least one script directory to be managed by it.  They'll also have a base namespace in mind which the contents of that script directory are to be contributed to.

The following page cover the described aspects of usage:

 Importing: How the directory hierarchy maps to namespace entry placement.
 FileChanges: Automatic code reloading.

=== Details ===

{{{
  import reloader
  cr = reloader.CodeReloader()
  cr.AddDirectory("baseModule", "scriptDirectory")
}}}
